Package ca.gedge.opgraph.exceptions

Provides exception support for the OpGraph core.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
InvalidTypeException An exception that is thrown during the processing of an OpGraph when a given input value isn't accepted by an InputField.
ItemMissingException An exception thrown whenever a given ContextualItem does not exist, but is required in some context.
ProcessingException A general exception that can be thrown during the processing of an OpGraph.
RequiredInputException An exception that is thrown during the processing of an OpGraph when a required input field is given no input.
 

Package ca.gedge.opgraph.exceptions Description

Provides exception support for the OpGraph core.
